level.heading: Unlawful agreements by owners or horse drawn cab drivers.
level.text: ยง 20-382 Unlawful agreements by owners or horse drawn cab drivers. It shall be unlawful for any owner or any horse drawn cab driver to have or make any contract or agreement with any owner of any hotel, apartment house, restaurant or cafe or with the agent or employee of such places, by which such owner or such horse drawn cab driver shall agree to solicit the patronage of any passenger for any such hotel, apartment house, restaurant or cafe.
